alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 23 at 4:40AM MST until October 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PDT MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 5 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 9 PM Sunday to 8 AM PDT Monday. For the Wind Advisory, until 5 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
